roleset.name: to meditate, plan beforehand
roleset.note: PREMEDITATE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from premeditate.01-v)

example.name: Murder, adjectival usage
example.text: On the judicial side, the judiciary reached a total conviction and after thorough checking and scrutiny, so that [this crime]-2 was committed *-2 deliberately and on purpose and was premeditated *-2 ...
